## NumberFormat type

Types of number formatting supported by Notion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NumberFormat = 'number_with_commas' | 'percent' | 'dollar' | 'euro' | 'pound' | 'yen' | 'rupee' | 'won' | 'yuan';
```
